trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.QueryCursor"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.QueryCursor"></xref> events, as well as the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.QueryCursor?displayProperty=fullName> attached event.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que irá processar a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.QueryCursor"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.QueryCursor"> </xref> eventos, bem como o <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.QueryCursor?displayProperty=fullName> anexados a eventos.

trans-unit.source: This delegate is used with the following attached events.
trans-unit.target: Este delegado é utilizado com os seguintes eventos anexados.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.QueryCursor?displayProperty=fullName> This delegate is used with the following routed events.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.QueryCursor?displayProperty=fullName>Este delegado é utilizado com os seguintes eventos encaminhados.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.QueryCursor?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: These routed events forward the previously listed attached events to make them more accessible to the general element model in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Estes eventos encaminhados reencaminhar os eventos anexados listados anteriormente para os tornar mais acessível para o modelo de elemento geral [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.QueryCursor?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.QueryCursor?displayProperty=fullName> The attached events and the base element routed events share their event data, and the bubbling and tunneling versions of the routed events also share event data.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.QueryCursor?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.QueryCursor?displayProperty=fullName>Os eventos anexados e os eventos de elemento base encaminhado partilham os seus dados de evento e o bubbling e túnel versões dos eventos encaminhados também partilham dados de eventos.</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.QueryCursor?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.QueryCursor?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This can affect the handled characteristics of the event as it travels the event route.
trans-unit.target: Isto pode afetar as características processadas do evento que circula-lo a rota de evento.
Para obter mais informações, consulte [descrição geral de entrada](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
